00002 //Description: Handle database I/O and user interface 
00003 //             for CDC geometry parameters
00004 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00005 //Created: 26 Aug, 2014
00006 //Comment: The units are "mm"(default), "um"(for wire radius) and "rad". 
00007 //Comment: Datum plain is upstream end plate of CDC
00008 //Comment: fVerboseLevel: 0:    Just Warning Messages and Error Messages
00009 //                        1:    + Dump()
00010 //                        >= 5: All informations
00011 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00050                 //general info
00051                 G4String get_MotherLogicalVolume() {return MotherLogicalVolume;}

00053                 G4String get_SDVolumeName() {return SDVolumeName;}

00063                 //layer info
00064                 G4int get_LayerNo() {return LayerNo;}
00065                 G4double get_layer_length(G4int layerId) {
00066                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_length[layerId];
00067                         else return 0;
00068                 }
00069                 G4double get_layer_Re(G4int layerId) { // radius on the end plate
00070                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_Re[layerId];
00071                         else return 0;
00072                 }
00073                 G4double get_layer_Rc(G4int layerId) { // radius in the center
00074                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_Rc[layerId];
00075                         else return 0;
00076                 }
00077                 G4int get_layer_firstWire(G4int layerId) { // in which hole to place the first field wire
00078                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_firstWire[layerId];
00079                         else return 0;
00080                 }
00081                 G4int get_layer_ID(G4int layerId) { // in which hole to place the first field wire
00082                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_ID[layerId];
00083                         else return 0;
00084                 }
00085                 G4double get_layer_SPhi(G4int layerId) { // phi position of the first field wire
00086                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_SPhi[layerId];
00087                         else return 0;
00088                 }
00089                 G4int get_layer_type(G4int layerId) {
00090                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_type[layerId];
00091                         else return 0;
00092                 }

00094                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_SkipHoles[layerId];
00095                         else return 0;
00096                 }

00132         private:
00133 
00134                 //=> check
00135                 bool check_layerId(int layerId){
00136                         if ( layerId < LayerNo ) return true;
00137                         else{
00138                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter, layerId is out of range! layerId = "<<layerId<<", LayerNo = "<<LayerNo<<std::endl;
00139                                 return false;
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142                 bool check_cellId(int layerId, int cellId){
00143                         if ( cellId < layer_HoleNo[layerId] ) return true;
00144                         else{
00145                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter, cellId is out of range! cellId = "<<cellId<<", cellNo= "<<layer_HoleNo[layerId]<<std::endl;
00146                                 return false;
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149                 bool check_LayerNo( int No ){
00150                         if( No != LayerNo ){
00151                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), insufficient layer info! LayerNo = "<<LayerNo<<", whilie only "<<No<<" layers were found."<<std::endl;
00152                                 return false;
00153                         }
00154                         else return true;
00155                 }
00156
